job.title: Attorney - Insurance defense
job.description: If you are an Attorney with experience please read onltbrgtltbrgtTop Reasons to Work with UsltbrgtltbrgtTexas based civil litigation defense firmltbrgtltbrgtWhat You Need for this Positionltbrgtltulgtltligt JD from an ABAaccredited law schoolltligtltligt 510 years of Insurance Defense experienceltligtltligt Premises liability construction defectltligtltligt TruckingTransportationltligtltligt Admitted to practice in TexasltbrgtltligtltulgtSo if you are an Attorney with experience please apply todayltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtEmail Your Resume In Word ToltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsoltbrgtltbrgtJoshHeidemannCyberCoderscomltbrgtltulgtltligtPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  JH61608209  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredltbrgtltligtltulgtJosh Heidemann  Sr Executive Recruiter  CyberCodersltbrgtltbrgtApplicants must be authorized to work in the USltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtYour Right to Workltstronggt  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
